Red Hat, Inc. is the primary sponsor for: Red Hat, Inc. is the primary sponsor for the Fedora Project. Red Hat provides the Fedora Project with a wide variety of resources, including full-time employee support, infrastructure, hardware and bandwidth, event funding, and legal counsel.

To sponsor our [Flock to Fedora](https://flocktofedora.org) conference, see the prospectus or email [sponsors{'@'}fedoraproject.org](mailto:sponsors{'@'}fedoraproject.org).

To mirror the repos, see the [Mirroring page](https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Infrastructure/Mirroring) or contact the [Infrastructure team](https://docs.fedoraproject.org/en-US/infra/#_communicating).
